manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_fighting` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `from_user` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `lasttime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `lastcredit` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_fighting_setting` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `parentid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动标题', `description` longtext NOT NULL COMMENT '活动介绍', `qnum` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '10' COMMENT '题目个数', `tgkf` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '跳过扣分', `tiao` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '1允许跳过0不允许', `status_fighting` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '0正常1暂停2结束', `answertime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '答题时间', `start` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1383235200' COMMENT '开始时间', `end` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1383235200' COMMENT '结束时间', `reply1` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '未绑定回复语', `reply2` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动未开始时回复语', `reply3` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动已结束时回复语', `reply4` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '开始答题提示语', `reply5` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '暂停回复', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
